posts.title: Automate the Start and End of Your Work Day
posts.description: This article is for those who own a Mac and use their machine for work and in private. If there are a bunch of applications you launch at the start of every day and stop by the end keep on reading.

posts.title: Fine-Tuning Google's Gemma-3-4B-IT Model with MLX_LM and Preparing It for Ollama
posts.description: The article is a blog post that offers a detailed, step-by-step guide to fine-tuning Google's Gemma-3-4B-IT model using MLX_LM on Apple Silicon. It covers downloading the base model from Hugging Face, training with LoRA adapters and a custom dataset, fusing the adapters, copying the tokenizer, converting the model to GGUF format for compatibility with Ollama, and setting up a Modelfile for deployment.
